pr_title: fix: DHIS2-10001 logic added to tracker importer to validate TEIs mandatory attributes

timeline.message: fix: DHIS2-10001 logic added to tracker importer to validate TEIs mandatory attributes
fix: DHIS2-10001 mandatory attributes in existing tests is set to false to fix tests

timeline.bodyText: This TEI passed to validation cannot be null, so we could simply get the attributes without the optional
timeline.author: enricocolasante

timeline.bodyText:
I found difficult following this Optional.of and then orElse flow and I am not sure if in this case you could really have a null TrackedEntityTypeAttribute in the list of trackedEntityType.getTrackedEntityTypeAttributes()
I would go with

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                            .filter( this::isMandatory )
          
          
            
                           .filter(Obects::isNotNull)
          
          
            
                           .filter(TrackedEntityTypeAttribute::isMandatory)
          
      
    
    
  

but of course this is purely personal style
timeline.author: enricocolasante

replies.bodyText: yes, your version is much easier, I'll change it
replies.author: gnespolino

timeline.message: feat: DHIS2-10001 mandatory attribute check implementation
